citations.narrative:
The facility self-reported approximately 3 weeks ago that a male coyote injured his left front leg attempting to dig under
the wire wall into the female coyote’s enclosure. He was taken to the veterinarian and the injury was repaired surgically.
There is a 1 inch by 1 inch welded wire wall separating the 2 enclosures. Prior to this event he had been observed
attempting to dig under the wire. He has been moved to a different enclosure while undergoing treatment. Outdoor
housing facilities must be structurally sound and must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury.
Correct by: 11/24/2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.125(a)  Critical
   
Facilities, general. 
The facility self-reported approximately 3 weeks ago that a male coyote injured his left front leg attempting to dig under 
the wire wall into the female coyote’s enclosure. He was taken to the veterinarian and the injury was repaired surgically. 
There is a 1 inch by 1 inch welded wire wall separating the 2 enclosures. Prior to this event he had been observed 
attempting to dig under the wire. He has been moved to a different enclosure while undergoing treatment. Outdoor 
housing facilities must be structurally sound and must be maintained in good repair to protect the animals from injury. 
Correct by: 11/24/2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with Facility Representative.
